name: Nano Banana Image Generator and Editor
description:
Generates or edits images using Google's Gemini models (Nano Banana/ Nano Banana Pro). Supports text-to-image and image-to-image/editing.
Requires a Gemini API key.

Notes:
- Generates 1 image per API call.
- Gemini 2.5 Flash (Nano Banana) is faster.
- Gemini 3 Pro (Nano Banana Pro) uses a reasoning process ("Thinking") and supports higher resolutions.
    
Best Practices & Strategies:
1. Be Hyper-Specific: Describe lighting, camera angles (e.g., "low-angle perspective"), and fine details.
2. Context & Intent: Explain the purpose (e.g., "Create a logo for a high-end brand").
3. Iteration: Use the conversational nature to refine (e.g., "Make lighting warmer").
4. Step-by-Step: For complex scenes, break instructions into steps (Background -> Foreground -> Subject).
5. Semantic Negative Prompts: Describe what you want positively (e.g., "empty street") rather than "no cars".
6. Photorealism: Use terms like "85mm lens", "bokeh", "golden hour", "studio-lit".
7. Text Rendering: Specify font style and placement clearly. Use 'pro' model for best text results.

Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (Nano Banana):
- Works best with up to 3 images as input.

Gemini 3 Pro Image Preview (Nano Banana Pro):
- Supports up to 14 images in total.
- Up to 6 images of objects with high-fidelity.
- Up to 5 images of humans to maintain character consistency.
author: @@official.shinkai

google_api_key.description: Mandatory API Key for Google GenAI.

output_filename.description: Optional base filename (whithout extenstion) for the generated image. If None, a timestamp is used.

output_folder.description: Optional full local folder path where to save a copy of the image.

model_selection.description: Optional model to use: 'flash' (Gemini 2.5 - Fast, Cheaper, Efficient) or 'pro' (Gemini 3 Pro - High Quality, Reasoning). Default: 'flash'.

resolution.description: Optional resolution of the generated image (Only for Pro model). One of: '1K, 2K, 4K'. Default: 1K

prompt.description: The text description of the image to generate or edit. Max: 5 000 characters.

reference_image_paths.description: Optional list of full local file paths to reference images for editing or composition. Up to 3 images for nano banana flash, up to 14 images for nano banana pro.

aspect_ratio.description: Optional aspect ratio of the generated image. One of : '1:1, 2:3, 3:2, 3:4, 4:3, 4:5, 5:4, 9:16, 16:9, 21:9'. Default: '1:1'

execution_details.description: Details about the execution, including warnings or error messages.

local_saved_image_path.description: Full local path where the generated image was saved.

thought_process.description: The thought process trace from the model (if available, e.g., in Pro model).
